data: Brain, or heart of the land, which you will, as large cities are, Paris may claim to have nerves, muscles, and arteries centering in it, which but few capitals, by right of size, passions, horrors, loves, charms, mysteries, in a word, can reveal.
france|browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels|category: french literature
